title: About Me
text: Hi, I’m Andrea! I am a Year 3 student in NUS with a major in Chemistry and minors in Forensic Science and Interactive Media Development. I am interested in the consumer goods industry and enjoy crafts and puzzles in my free time. Feel free to navigate this website to learn more about myself and the works I have done!

title: NM2207 Computational Media Literacy
text:
In this module, I learned to use R for data analysis and visualisation. Using the tools gained and further exploration of my own, I created a data story as my final project.

 Final Project This final project communicates insights from the data source named “The Smell of Fear”. It aims to answer the question whether a smell of fear exists.


     Image by Richard Osborne


 To find our more about my work done prior to this, click here.
